mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(1) from maoding_web_exp_main a LEFT JOIN maoding_web_exp_audit b on a.id = b.main_id and b.is_new='Y'
LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company_user c on b.audit_person = c.id and c.company_id = a.company_id
LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company_user e on a.company_user_id = e.id and e.company_id = a.company_id
WHERE 1=1 and (a.type = 1 or a.type = 2) AND a.approve_status != '4'

SELECT a.exp_flag,a.type,group_concat(d.exp_allname) as exp_type_name,d.exp_pname,d.exp_type,a.exp_no,a.id,a.company_id,a.company_user_id,e.user_name as user_name, a.exp_date,a.allocation_date,b.audit_person,c.user_name as audit_person_name, a.approve_status,b.approve_date , (select s.exp_use from maoding_web_exp_detail s where s.main_id=a.id ORDER BY s.seq LIMIT 1) AS exp_use, sum(d.exp_amount) as exp_sum_amount,COUNT(1) as detail_count, ifnull(depart_name,company_name) as depart_name from maoding_web_exp_main a INNER JOIN maoding_web_exp_detail d on a.id = d.main_id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_exp_audit b on a.id = b.main_id and b.is_new='Y' LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company_user c on b.audit_person = c.id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company_user e on a.company_user_id = e.id left join maoding_web_company company on (company.id = a.company_id) left join maoding_web_depart depart on (depart.id =a.depart_id) WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY a.`allocation_date` ASC
GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY a.`allocation_date` DESC
GROUP BY a.id order by a.create_date DESC
LIMIT #{startPage},#{endPage}

SELECT ifnull(sum(d.exp_amount),0) as exp_sum_amount, ifnull(sum(if(a.approve_status ='6',d.exp_amount,0)),0) as financial_allocation_sum_amount, ifnull(sum(IF(a.approve_status = '1',d.exp_amount,0)),0) AS waiting_allocation_sum_amount, ifnull(sum(IF(a.approve_status = '7',d.exp_amount,0)),0) AS repulse_allocation_sum_amount, ifnull(depart_name,company_name) as company_name, ifnull(a.depart_id,a.company_id) as company_id from maoding_web_exp_main a INNER JOIN maoding_web_exp_detail d on a.id = d.main_id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_exp_audit b on a.id = b.main_id and b.is_new='Y'
LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company_user e on a.company_user_id = e.id
left join maoding_web_company company on (company.id = a.company_id) left join maoding_web_depart depart on (depart.id =a.depart_id)

SELECT distinct ifnull(a.depart_id,a.company_id) as company_id,ifnull(depart_name,company_name) as company_name from maoding_web_exp_main a INNER JOIN maoding_web_exp_detail d on a.id = d.main_id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_exp_audit b on a.id = b.main_id and b.is_new='Y'
LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company_user e on a.company_user_id = e.id
left join maoding_web_company company on (company.id = a.company_id) left join maoding_web_depart depart on (depart.id =a.depart_id)

SELECT count(DISTINCT a.id) from maoding_web_exp_main a INNER JOIN maoding_web_exp_detail d on a.id = d.main_id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_exp_audit b on a.id = b.main_id and b.is_new='Y'
LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company_user e on a.company_user_id = e.id
left join maoding_web_company company on (company.id = a.company_id) left join maoding_web_depart depart on (depart.id =a.depart_id)
WHERE 1=1

SELECT a.* ,( SELECT SUM(b.exp_amount) FROM maoding_web_exp_detail b WHERE b.main_id = a.id ) AS exp_sum_amount, IFNULL( ( SELECT c.company_name FROM maoding_web_company c WHERE c.id = a.depart_id ), ( SELECT d.depart_name FROM maoding_web_depart d WHERE d.id = a.depart_id ) ) AS depart_name, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(e.exp_name SEPARATOR '、') FROM maoding_web_exp_detail e WHERE e.main_id = a.id ) AS exp_name FROM maoding_web_exp_main a WHERE a.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT a.exp_flag,a.exp_no,group_concat(d.exp_use ORDER BY d.create_date separator',') as exp_type_name,d.exp_type,a.id,a.company_id, a.exp_date, a.approve_status,c.user_name as user_name, GROUP_concat(CONCAT(d.exp_pname,'-',d.exp_name)) as exp_pname, GROUP_concat(DISTINCT e.project_name) as project_name, sum(d.exp_amount) as exp_sum_amount,COUNT(1) as detail_count from maoding_web_exp_main a INNER JOIN maoding_web_exp_detail d on a.id = d.main_id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company_user c on a.company_user_id = c.id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project e on d.project_id = e.id where a.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select IFNULL(max(m.exp_no),1000)+1 from maoding_web_exp_main m where 1=1
AND m.company_id =#{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT exp_main.id,exp_main.company_user_id as companyUserId,exp_main.version_num as versionNum,company_user.user_name as userName,exp_main.exp_no as expNo, exp_main.approve_status as approveStatus,exp_main.type, (select sum(exp_amount) from maoding_web_exp_detail where main_id = exp_main.id) as amount, leave_detail.start_time as startTime,leave_detail.end_time as endTime, leave_detail.leave_time as leaveTime,leave_detail.leave_type as leaveType,leave_detail.address from maoding_web_exp_main exp_main INNER JOIN maoding_web_company_user company_user on exp_main.company_user_id = company_user.id
INNER JOIN maoding_copy_record copy on exp_main.id = copy.target_id
LEFT JOIN maoding_web_leave_detail leave_detail on exp_main.id = leave_detail.main_id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_exp_audit exp_audit on exp_main.id = exp_audit.main_id WHERE 1=1 AND exp_main.approve_status != '4'
AND exp_main.company_user_id =#{companyUserId}
AND exp_main.id =#{mainId}
AND exp_main.type = #{expType}
AND POSITION(exp_main.type IN #{expTypes})
AND exp_audit.audit_person =#{auditPerson}
AND POSITION(exp_main.company_user_id IN #{userIds})
and exp_audit.approve_status = 0 and exp_audit.is_new='Y'
and exp_audit.approve_status != 0
and (exp_main.approve_status = 1 or exp_main.approve_status = 6 )
and (exp_main.approve_status = 1 or exp_main.approve_status = 6 or exp_main.approve_status = 2)
and exp_main.approve_status = 5
and exp_main.approve_status = 0
and copy.deleted = 0 and copy.company_user_id = #{ccCompanyUserId} and (exp_main.approve_status = 6 and 3> exp_main.type or exp_main.approve_status = 1 and exp_main.type >2 )
AND (leave_detail.address LIKE '%' #{keyword} '%' or ((exp_main.type = 1 or exp_main.type=2) and exp_main.exp_no LIKE '%' #{keyword} '%'))
and #{startDate} <= exp_main.exp_date
and #{endDate} >= exp_main.exp_date
and SUBSTR(exp_main.exp_date,1,7)=#{month}
GROUP BY exp_main.id order by exp_main.create_date DESC
select sum(exp_amount) as exp_sum_amount from maoding_web_exp_detail where main_id = #{mainId}

SELECT a.*,b.exp_amount as exp_sum_amount from maoding_web_exp_main a INNER JOIN maoding_web_exp_detail b on a.id = b.main_id INNER JOIN maoding_relation_record c on a.id = c.target_id where c.relation_id = #{relationId} and a.approve_status !=4 limit 1

SELECT exp_main.id, exp_main.company_user_id AS companyUserId, exp_main.exp_date, exp_main.version_num AS versionNum, company_user.user_name AS userName, exp_main.exp_no AS expNo, exp_main.approve_status AS approveStatus, s.type_name AS approveStatusName, exp_main.type, e.type_name AS expTypeName FROM maoding_web_exp_main exp_main INNER JOIN maoding_web_company_user company_user ON exp_main.company_user_id = company_user.id INNER JOIN md_type_exp_status AS s ON s.id = exp_main.approve_status INNER JOIN md_type_exp as e ON e.id = exp_main.type LEFT JOIN maoding_web_exp_audit exp_audit ON exp_main.id = exp_audit.main_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND exp_main.approve_status != '4'
AND exp_main.company_user_id =#{companyUserId}
and exp_audit.approve_status = 0 and exp_audit.is_new='Y'
and exp_audit.approve_status != 0
AND exp_audit.audit_person =#{auditPerson}
and (exp_main.approve_status = 1 or exp_main.approve_status = 6 )
and (exp_main.approve_status = 1 or exp_main.approve_status = 6 or exp_main.approve_status = 2)
GROUP BY exp_main.id order by exp_main.create_date DESC

AND exp_main.company_user_id =#{companyUserId}
and exp_audit.approve_status = 0 and exp_audit.is_new='Y'
and exp_audit.approve_status != 0
AND exp_audit.audit_person =#{auditPerson}
